content: our aneta shawl is made with simple crochet stitches to create a pretty and simple triangular shawl **finished measurements** approximately 47 / 119 cm across top x 23 / 58 cm down center **yarn** berroco lucca 1 50 grs 3 balls #5825 cranberry **hooks and notions** crochet hook size 7 / 4 5mm or size to obtain gauge **gauge** 15 double_crochet and 9 row = 4 / 10 cm 1 https //www berroco com/yarns/berroco-lucca
